body.name: Winsome Mission Beech Wood 4-Tier Bookshelf With Slanted Shelf, Natural (82430)
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Tuesday, February 20. Order within 19 hrs 17 mins
features: Dimensions: 30.1"(H) x 24"(W) x 10"(D). Solid top can also be used as a side table perfect for holding a lamp or vase of flowers.
Shelf backs tilted for easy access to books. Perfect for novel and magazine collections.
body.description: Product Description With tilted shelves, this 2-Tier Bookshelf displays books and magazines so that the spines are easy to view.The top can also be used as a side table perfect for holding a lamp or vase of flowers. Dimensions- 61.0 cm x 25.4 cm x 76.5 cm Amazon.com A great small-space solution, Winsome Wood's two-tier bookshelf has a light, airy look and a versatile design that works well in a dorm room, bedroom, or office. The solid beechwood stand features two long shelves placed at a slant so books tilt upward. No more getting on hands and knees to find that poetry anthology on the bottom row! The solid counter also adds an extra storage and display area-top it with a picture frame and plant, and it feels so cozy! With a light natural finish and an open back and sides, this piece offers a clean and contemporary style. It measures 24 inches wide by 10 inches deep by 30 inches high; assembly is required. --Kara Karll

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Winsome Juliet Book Shelf Create your own library nook with the Juliet 2-Tier Tilted Bookshelf. Made of solid wood in a natural finish, this unique shelf unit is a lovely way to display your favorite books and magazines. Use it in the kitchen for your cookbooks where you could take advantage of the upper slanted shelf to keep a recipe propped open while you work. Or put it in a playroom or the kids' rooms where they can find their go-to books by the familiar covers. Each slanted shelf is 22.4"W x 4.3"D x 11.8"H, offering plenty of room to shelve books spine out, displayed side by side, or both. The solid top is there for a lamp, a vase of flowers, or framed family photographs. Conveniently packed and shipped in 1 box that includes the hardware needed for assembly. Features Open Airy Design Slanted shelves Easy assembly Ships in 1 box Constructed of solid/composite wood
Specifications Overall size: 24"W x 10"D x 30.1"H Open shelf dimensions: 22.4"W x 4.3"D x 11.8"H Made of Solid Wood Assembly required Ships in 1 box

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great bookshelf for toddlers
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. I love the size and how easy it was to put together. It feels nice and sturdy. Good value for sure!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Exceptionally well designed, engineered and pre-fabricated for easy assembly.
reviews.reviewText: The 2 canted shelves--- -24 inches long, will easily hold 12 to 14 typical 1.5inthich 7 x 9.5 inch hard cover books. The canted shelf design provides better visibility , easier useful access for your personal library right next to your reading lounge chair. Great , long, easy to use screws secure the bookcase exceptionally well. -No movement, no squeeks, SOLID. I plan to add casters to mine which appears easy to do. The bookcase is stable . Lower shelf will accept slightly taller books than the top shelf- which aids stability. Wood finish is professional . light oak color. per picture on Amazon. Exceeds my expectations !!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2019
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars To Small for Text Books
reviews.reviewText: I purchased the bookcase to place text books (math, physics, engineering, chemistry) and three ring binders from previous semesters that I still use. The description states 11.8' high, but that is the clearance at the lowest point of the slanted shelf. Can't get text book through the highest point on the shelf. Great little book case and easy to assemble. Sturdy and very sleek design. But can't do the job I need. Great for small books, magazines, etc, just not text books.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: One of best purchases I’ve made in long time. Outstanding quality, simple to assemble, & perfect for intended use. I unpacked & put it together myself in about 15 minutes (I’m an elderly female). Angled shelves are my favorites for book. Very sturdy. Smaller depth than most bookcases allowed me to place in hallway where it’s convenient to both living area & bedrooms.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars My sisters are sooo impressed!
reviews.reviewText: I am not a "carpenter - lady" but I was able to assemble this bookcase by myself! It looks stunning and is very sturdy. My eyes aren't the best so having pictures of how to put it together was easier for me than long drawn out explanations. I marked - with my post-its - each piece of wood with its alphabetic letter (from the picture.) I assembled it using the sketches and the funky screwdriver that came in the box and my kitchen table and my wheelchair. I am so proud of myself and applaud the Winsome Juliet company for crafting a wonderful product for the money!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 12, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for small home library
reviews.reviewText: This bookshelf was easy to assemble and I love the way it showcases my books in my personal library

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 12, 2017
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Good product - damage to wood makes it just OK.
reviews.reviewText: I ordered this item twice this year. Both times they came well packaged, were easy to assemble and looked just like the picture - no problems there.Unfortunately, the second one was slightly damaged. The packaging was fine, so I didn't notice until weeks later when I got around to assembling it. It looks like the wood was crushed before it was packaged and shipped. I needed to use it so chose not to return it - just thought I should report the problem here for other buyers to be aware.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 31, 2009
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Works for me
reviews.reviewText: Reasons I bought this product:1. Does not 'take over' a smaller room like a tall bookcase2. Slanted shelving makes it easy to see spine of item3. Very easy for 1 person to put together (can be done in 15 min)4. Additional storage on top shelf5. Neutral coloring6. Small footprint7. Very sturdy; does not wobble; is not off balance when fullNot so great:1. Downward slanting shelves won't accommodate books taller than about 10.5 inches upright2. Open back does not allow you to lay anything flat on top of anything upright (will slide off the back)I bought 4 of these bad boys from Amazon. Tops hold photos, a flat panel 26 in tv, 2 lamps, 4 remotes, telephone and PC speakers. Shelves hold DVDs, books, magazines and a large print King James Bible in a zippered cover.
super easy to assemble, and also very sturdy. I love the natural look of it since we already put lots of colourful book on it.
So happy with this purchase! Easy to build and very sturdy I use it for my toddlers books

Solid little bookshelf that was well-packaged and went together easily. There were minor imperfections in the alignment that did not affect the final constructed product.The bottom shelf fits books up to 10.5" tall regardless of width. Because of the topmost shelf, the upper shelf is limited to just under 9" for wider books (e.g. children's books), but narrower books can be taller. Small books (again, kids' books) can slip and fall down the back if they're very short or light, and shouldn't be set near the sides.
Sturdy and goot bookshelf for corner of a room. However smaller and thinner books will easily fall through of course.

reviews.reviewTitle: Easy to assemble and holds lots of books
reviews.reviewText: Easy to assemble and holds lots of books. A bit smaller then I thought based on the thumbnail, so read the specific size details when ordering. Was sufficiently sized for my kids bedrooms. I put these beside each of their beds so they will always have good books on hand. They fit many different sized books and even larger hardcover books.
